Uses of Package
com.teksystems.salestaxexercise

Packages that use com.teksystems.salestaxexercise 
Package Description
com.teksystems.salestaxexercise
Base package for the module
com.teksystems.salestaxexercise.goods
A good is the simplest type of sellable item.
com.teksystems.salestaxexercise.runners
Contains classes used to run end-to-end tests of the entire module
com.teksystems.salestaxexercise.tax
Contains all interfaces and classes related to taxes
com.teksystems.salestaxexercise.tax.canada
Package containing all tax information specific to Canada

    Basket
    Basic interface for a collection of items with prices attached to them TODO: this interface would ideally just extend Collection
    Receiptable  
    Sellable
    A generic interface for anything that can be sold for a given price This interface could apply to an individual item that can be sold, e.g.
    SellableItem  
    Taxable
    Defines the interface for any object that has taxes associated with it Not just individual items or goods that are taxable, but also collections of taxable goods
    TaxableBasket  
    TaxableItem
    Interface specific to a single, unitary item that is taxable.
